Recreating the college experience.

Connect digitally with other Cornell students.

Discover new people

We curate a Discover feed to show you peers that share your interests.

Automated scheduling

We find the best time for you to meet and send it right to your calendar.

Video conferencing

We set up a Google Meets link for you so you can connect with just a click.

A Coffee Chat Culture


At Cornell, we pride ourselves on a diverse and welcoming student body. We built Taro to help students meet new friends, build new connections, and socialize from the comfort of their homes.
